settings.how_to_apply:
• Place stencil on the eyebrow using a widened two finger hold, using either the short or long length guide
  • Gently tap the sponge into the pomade and tap into the lid of the pomade to remove any excess product
  • Apply using a tapping motion starting at the tail of the eyebrow
  • Wipe stencil and flip stencil over to complete the other eyebrow
  • Use enclosed spoolie to blend the pomade (especially at the front of the eyebrow for a softer look)
settings.why_love:
• Waterproof and smudge-proof formula
  • Create perfect brows in seconds
  • Washable signature sponge applicator
  • Includes 9 stencil designs with 2 length options
  • Available in 8 different shades
  • Waterproof formula is blend-able until dry
  • Buildable pomade formula to create looks from natural to bold

settings.heading: Brow First Beauty
settings.content:
Eyebrows frame the face, they accentuate our unique features and help convey our emotions. Brows say so much, so we decided to create an entire line of beauty products for them.

Our name Brow Trio is inspired by the magic the number 3 holds in creating, shaping and maintaining our best brows. Each brow shape is broken down into 3 parts: front, arch and tail. Each of these parts requires attention when creating your best brows. Understanding your brow shape is key to creating a balanced look.

They say the best things come in 3s and we believe that also includes your brows. It only takes 3 steps to create and emphasize beautiful brows using our trio method.

settings.title: The Brow Trio
settings.description: Meet our most popular kit. It includes 12 stencils, waterproof and smudge-proof pomade and our signature sponge brush. Transform your brows in a few easy steps.

settings.title: Brow Sets
settings.description: Shop our brow sets and transform your brow routine. Our sets offer the perfect opportunity to try our popular kits, explore other brow products in our collection and save.

settings.title: Eyebrow Setting Gel
settings.description: Need help taming brow hair and keeping it in place? Our long-wearing clear gel thickens and tames brow hair, without flaking. Setting gel can also create a more fluffy brow look. Our formula is vegan and cruelty- free.

settings.title: Color Match
settings.heading: FIND YOUR perfect COLOR MATCH
settings.content: Don't know what color is your perfect match? Don't worry, we have you covered. We offer a free home try-on kit to help you find your ideal shade. Each home try-on kit comes with 3-5 small sample wefts that you can match to the ends of your hair. If you need further assistance we offer video chat over Skype and in-house color matches which you can book on our website. For Skype calls we highly recommend ordering a home try-on kit before your call. All color matching services can be booked here.

settings.how_to_apply:
Directions: Run sponge under water for 1 minute until sponge expands. Swirl sponge around in soap, then rub sponge gently on the textured mat to loosen pomade. Pomade will peel from sponge.
Paraben and sulfate free.
settings.why_love:
• Our rose scented Signature Sponge Brush Cleanser is specially formulated to remove pomade from Signature Sponge Brush without damaging the integrity of the sponge material
  • Vegan and cruelty free, this cleanser is a must have for maintaining a clean, grime-free sponge brush. When paired with the anti-microbial, textured silicone mat contained in the lid, even our long-lasting 24 hour pomade will be easily cleansed from the sponge

settings.how_to_apply: After using The Brow Trio, use against the growth of the hair to remove stray hairs.
settings.why_love: Perfect for after applying The Brow Trio to further perfect your brow shape. Remove stray brow hairs quickly, easily, and painlessly with our pack of 3 eyebrow razors. Each razor includes a stainless steel safety cover and precision protective cover to protect the blade when not in use.

settings.how_to_apply: For use with The Brow Trio
settings.why_love: Includes 3 XL stencils each with a varying arch type, low, regular, and high. Create thick, perfect brows in seconds!

settings.how_to_apply:
Unpack the brow stencils and find your best brow shape. The stencil that incorporates the most of your brow hair will be the correct one. If you have little to no brow hair, you can be more flexible with your stencil choice. 

When applying pomade, place stencil on brow using a widened two finger hold, using either the short or long length guide.
settings.why_love: By using a custom-developed 2-in-1 measuring system, each stencil allows for your brow shape to be applied in a long and short length. This allows you to achieve your accurate length. These stencils are perfect for using at home with our pomade and are also great for microblading, makeup artists or for estheticians (think tinting/waxing).

settings.how_to_apply: You can apply our highlighter below the brow bone for an instant brow lift,  the inner corner of the eye for an eye-brightening effect and even on your cupid's bow. Feel free to experiment and apply wherever you want a touch of light to appear.

settings.title: About Our Kit
settings.content: Meet the ultimate brow kit. Our most popular product,          was designed to effortlessly fill in your brows and give you your dream shape. Itâs beginner friendly and takes only a few easy steps to transform your brows.

settings.title: how to apply

• Place stencil on the eyebrow using a widened two finger hold, using either the short or long length guide
  • Gently tap the sponge into the pomade and tap into the lid of the pomade to remove any excess product
  • Apply using a tapping motion starting at the tail of the eyebrow
  • Wipe stencil and flip stencil over to complete the other eyebrow

settings.title: frequent questions
settings.content:
How do I know what shade to choose?
It is best to match your brow hair when choosing a shade. If youâre in between colors, choosing the lighter shade is best as our formula is very pigmented.

How do I get both sides even?
After completing one brow, turn the stencil on its side and line up the bottom of both brows and press stencil into skin lightly. This will create a guide of where to start the other eyebrow.

How do I know which eyebrow stencil to use?
The best stencil for you will be the one that incorporates the majority of your brow hair. If you have little to no brow hair, congratulations! You can be more flexible with your stencil choice.

How do I get the most natural look?
As the pomade is buildable, start lightly. You can always apply more. The most natural look is created when the brow is more filled in from the arch to the tail and lighter and blended in the front. Be sure to blend the front of the brows with the spoolie for a natural fade.

settings.title: what makes our kit different
settings.content:
Waterproof, smudge/proof formula
12 eyebrow stencils that provide an option for all brow shapes
Double ended signature sponge provides precise application and blending in one simple tool

settings.title: How to Get Your Brows Symmetrical
Q&A W/ Brow Trio Founder Bree
Beach Ready Brows
settings.description: We officially have summertime on our minds. Are you prepared for summer at the beach or by the pool? Our waterproof pomade is ready for all your summer days soaking up the sun and catching some waves.

settings.sub_txt:
See how our #teamtrio styles our collection of
products to create their best brows.

settings.point_txt: Place stencil on brow using a widened two finger hold, using either the short or long length guide.
Gently tap the sponge into the pomade. Tap the sponge into the lid of the pomade to remove any excess product.
Apply using a tapping motion starting at the tail of the brow.
Wipe stencil off and flip the stencil. Follow previous step on the other brow.
Use the spoolie end of the sponge brush to blend the pomade (especially at the front of the eyebrow for a softer look).

settings.point_bdy:
12 Stencils :Kit includes 12 stencils. 4 regular arch, 4 low arch, and 4 high arch options, so youâll always find your perfect brow! Stencil designs include a 2 in 1 length choice, so that whether you have a more lengthened brow, or a petite brow, we have you covered! Each stencil was created with thousands of brows in mind from experience in the permanent makeup industry.

Pomade : 36 hour wear formula, our pomade is smooth, creamy, waterproof, smudge-proof, and buildable so you can alternate between natural looking day time brows, to filled in night time glam brows. Pomade is beautifully blend-able until it dries. If used daily, each jar will last around 3 months.

Dual Ended Signature Sponge Brush : Apply and blend with one simple tool. Perfectly bouncy, washable sponge brush (bye-bye bacteria!) is specialized to apply the perfect amount of pomade according to your desired density. Small enough for a precise application.

All enclosed in a zipper pouch for your beauty drawer or handbag.

The Brow Trio founder Bree Olson created the stencils when she was a micro-blading artist in Southern California. She would use the stencils to pre-draw clients' brows before permanent makeup. Each stencil was designed with thousands of brows in mind from experience in the permanent makeup industry.
We recommend following our ultimate brow stencil kit with our brow swipe pen to add extra texture. At the end of your routine use our brow gel or brow lifting wax to hold your brows in place all day.

How do I know which stencil is best for me?

The stencil that incorporates the most of your brow hair will be the correct one. If you have little to no brow hair, you can be more flexible with your stencil choice.

How can I get the most natural look while using the brow trio?

Not filling in the front with too much pomade, and blending the front is key to a natural looking filled in brow.

How do I know which shade to choose?

Please take our color match quiz located on our website. Alternatively, you can email a picture of your brows to info@thebrowtrio.com and one of our color match specialists can recommend a shade for you.

How often, and how do I clean the sponge?

Sponge cleansing is advised weekly to avoid product buildup.

This can be done by running the sponge under water for 1 minute, adding a little soap, and pomade will flake from sponge. Our signature sponge cleanser is great for this, as it has a textured mat inside the lid to help remove pomade.

How do I get both brows as symmetrical as possible?

After applying pomade to one brow, turn the stencil on its side and line up the bottom of both brows with the stencil. Press the stencil into the skin lightly to create an indentation. This will create a guide of where to start the other eyebrow for a balanced look.

How long will my application last?

Although the formula is waterproof and smudge proof, daily removal and application is advised. We do have many customers that wear the application for 2-3 days at a time.

How do I clean the pomade from the stencils?

After each side, wipe the pomade from the stencil with a tissue. If pomade has dried on the stencil, remove with a makeup wipe.

settings.point_txt: It is important to define the shape you desire for your brows and then decide how you want to go about creating or defining your shape. To do this you can use grooming tools, pomades, stencils, brow pens and pencils.

It is time to add texture to create a 3-dimensional look. Even if you donât have a lot of hair to work with, there are ways to create dreamy depth. To add texture, create realistic hair strokes and shading using our brow pens and pencils.

Once your brows have been filled in and texturized, itâs time to make sure they last. End your routine by setting your brows. Use our brow wax or gel to add lift, fluff, emphasize texture and hold your look in place.

Want to have some fun? You can intensify your brow look with glowing highlighters in an array of shades.

settings.title: The Trio Method
settings.desc: Weâve created a simple 3 step routine that can be customized to create your best brows that are uniquely yours. This method can be followed using different combinations of our proucts depending on brow needs and goals.

settings.desc_f:
Brow Trio was created by Bree Olson in the spring of 2020 and is very much a pandemic success story. Bree had spent years building one of the most successful eyebrow microblading businesses in Southern California. Living eyebrows day in and day out exposed Bree to her clientâs daily eyebrow frustrations. The eyebrow products that women needed didnât exist or required expert makeup techniques which led women to seek out expensive permanent solutions, like microblading.

With the closure of her business due to Covid-19 restrictions, Bree set out to build a business that gave women the products that THEY needed. Products that were easy to use, and didnât require permanent procedures. Products that give ALL women the confidence of beautiful brows. Boom! Brow Trio was born. An eyebrow first makeup brand focused on giving women inexpensive, innovative industry-leading eyebrow products. Products that women truly want.
settings.desc_m: We believe brows are personal. Our products are designed to meet you where you are, to celebrate your brows and to emphasize what makes your brows unique. Brows are not meant to be perfect and there isnât one right way to do them. Fill them in, fluff them, highlight them, the options are endless. We hope our products bring you confidence and help you see just how beautiful you already are.
settings.desc_p: Our products are cruelty-free and vegan and formulated to emphasize what makes your brows unique. Our pomades, pens and pencils are beautifully pigmented and designed for a wide range of hair shades, and great for all skin tones.

settings.subtitle1:
Trio Beauty is an evolving beauty collection that
centers on the power of transformation.

settings.subtitle1: You define your beauty. Wear makeup the way you want and show yourself to the world with courage.

Pomade is beautifully blend-able until it dries. If used daily, each jar will last around 3 months.

Dual Ended Signature Sponge Brush : Apply and blend with one simple tool. Perfectly bouncy, washable sponge brush (bye- bye bacteria!) is specialized to apply the perfect amount of pomade according to your desired density. Small enough for a precise application.
All enclosed in a zipper pouch for your beauty drawer or handbag.

settings.subtitle1:
Trio Beauty is an evolving beauty collection that powers individuality, revealing the radiance that lies within each of us.

Beginning with our signature Brow Trio Kit, each Trio Beauty essential is envisioned as a means to define one's own beauty, elevating makeup to an intuitive art form.

Our journey began in 2020 with the introduction of the signature Brow Trio, a three-part stencil kit developed to create one's dream brow shape regardless of their natural eyebrow texture or shape. To this day, the Brow Trio defines our core principle â to express inner radiance through transformative beauty.

settings.titleb: Express your inner radiance through transformative Â beauty.

settings.subtitle1: Like a butterflyâs metamorphosis, it has taken us time to discover who we are and what we want to become.  Our journey began in 2020 with the introduction of the signature Brow Trio, a three-part stencil kit developed to create one's dream brow shape regardless of their natural eyebrow texture or shape. To this day, the Brow Trio defines our core principle â to express inner radiance through transformative beauty.

Briana Olson grew up in Tasmania, Australia, surrounded by the ocean and the beauty of nature. Beginning at an early age, she explored makeup as a creative medium, and quickly realized its potential for artistry, experimentation, and self-expression.

Olson's early penchant for beauty led her to found La Perma Artistry, which soon became one of the most successful eyebrow microblading businesses in Southern California. After closing La Perma in 2020 to pandemic setbacks, she set her sights on creating thoughtful, personal products developed to enliven her client's beauty regimens. Thus, Olson founded Trio Beauty in 2020, centered upon the belief that the world of beauty can offer a profound experience of self-care.
At Trio Beauty we explore the magic of your daily beauty routine.
